price: 11. Allahas (Vienintelis) duoda pradžią kūrimui, tada Jis pakartos tai, tada pas jį Jūs būsite sugrąžinti.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
